edu.jhu.zpalmer2.spring2009.ai.hw6.algorithm

Interface ReinforcementLearningAgent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    SimulationBasedReinforcementLearningAgent
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MetricTrackingAgent, QLearningAgent, ValueIteratingAgent

    public interface ReinforcementLearningAgent
extends java.io.Serializable
    This interface is implemented by those classes which represent reinforcement learning agent. A reinforcement learning agent will, after an amount of learning, produce a policy which can be used to make decisions in the agent's world. A reinforcement learning agent is stateful; it maintains intermediate data representing the knowledge it has obtained. Each call to the learning method makes some amount of progress toward a final policy. If it does not reach the final policy, it indicates as much and expects to be called again. In either case, the object is prepared to produce a policy; it may just be suboptimal. As a result of the state being stored in this object, persisting a reinforcement learning agent is sufficient to ensure that knowledge is preserved between JVMs.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ReinforcementLearningAgent duplicate()
      Creates a duplicate of this reinforcement learning agent.
      Policy getPolicy()
      Retrieves the policy that this algorithm has thus far established.
      boolean iterate()
      Performs some work in approaching a final policy.

    • Method Detail

      • iterate

        boolean iterate()
        Performs some work in approaching a final policy. Note that multiple final policies may exist as a result of the particulars of the algorithm in question (such as a flexible definition of convergence); this algorithm will simply do work in an attempt to reach one of them.
        Returns:
        true if a final policy was found; false otherwise.

      • getPolicy

        Policy getPolicy()
        Retrieves the policy that this algorithm has thus far established.
        Returns:
        A policy produced by this algorithm.

      • duplicate

        ReinforcementLearningAgent duplicate()
        Creates a duplicate of this reinforcement learning agent.
